changeSet.author: me
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE worker ( id bigserial primary key, name varchar not null unique, is_ready boolean not null )

changeSet.author: me
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE worker_param ( id bigserial primary key, name varchar not null, optional boolean not null, worker_id bigint not null references worker(id) )
